definitions.definition: One hired to assist another in playing the game of golf.
To serve as a caddy, carrying golf clubs etc.
definitions.example: I was honored to caddy for Tiger Woods at a charity golf game.

definitions.definition: A small box, can, or chest to keep things in.
A movable tray or other mechanism for holding, securing, and transporting a removable component within a piece of machinery or equipment.
definitions.example: Place the disc in the DVD caddy.
